titleInfo.title: Recognition hysteresis of the acetylcholine receptor of torpedo californica
7th International Symposium on Affinity Chromatography and Interfacial Macromolecular Interactions: held in Oberammergau, F.R.G., 17 - 21 Aug., 1987

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Neumann, Eberhard, Boldt, Elvira, Rauer, Barbara, Wolf, Hendrik, and Chang, Hai Won. 1988. “Recognition hysteresis of the acetylcholine receptor of torpedo californica”.
